title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Konica Hexanon AR 40mm f/1·8
text: Really like how the building is silhouetted here.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Konica Hexanon AR 40mm f/1.8
text: This isn't as good as I was hoping.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Konica Hexanon AR 40mm f/1.8
text: I wanted to try using this lens again.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tair 3 Phs
text: Not the sharpest photo of the moon, but I still think it's cool. First clear night we've had in a while.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tair 3 Phs
text: Turned out better than I thought it would, but it's quite noisy. It is straight out of the camera, maybe editing it could help but I'm not in the mood.

title: Canon Powershot G10
text: I went for a nice walk today. It was realxing.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Helios 44-2
text: I missed focus annoyingly, should've used a tripod.

title: Canon Powershot G10
text: Pigeon!

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tair 3 Phs
text: I did try to get some photos of birds in the garden today, but none turned up surpisingly.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tair 3 PhS
text: A crazy looking USSR lens I got. It's 300mm and came with the "Photosniper" gun grip which I definitely cannot use outside haha.

title: Canon Powershot G10
text: Some cute and mischievous pigeons!

title: Canon Powershot G10
text: They're so cute! I went for a nice walk around a lake near me, I shot a roll of Superia Premium as well.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + FujiFilm XF 27mm f/2.8
text: I have both normal JPEGs and RAW files saving on the camera, so might as well post a straight out of the camera JPEG once right?

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Konica Hexanon AR 40mm f/1.8 (I think)
text: I switched lenses a few times when doing this so that's why I'm unsure. Anyway, here's one of my very dusty gunpla builds. I was testing out a Godox flash I've had for a while and never used. I don't really know much about doing flash photography to be honest.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + FujiFilm XF 27mm f/2.8
text: Leaf!

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + FujiFilm XF 14mm f/2.8
text: I liked the view a lot. It was hard to photograph though due to it being directly at the sun.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Fujinan CCTV GDS-35/1.7
text: Yeah I didn't do too well here. Annoyingly I had planned to go outside to take photos, but it was pouring with rain all day. I did go for my first cycle in months though.

title: Kodak Charmera
text: I got this in order to mod it in the future. Obviously the quality is terrible, but that's kind of the point. I do like it, but definitely would not recommend it for the price. Just get one of the Aliexpress knockoffs.

title: Canon Powershot G10
text: I accidentally had it on auto, so the flash went off... People nearby weren't happy. But still, cute pigeon.

title: Canon Powershot G10
text: My choice of film for tomorrow.

title: Canon Powershot G10
text: I like this flavour.

title: Canon Powershot G10

title: Google Pixel 8 Pro...
text: It's a new phone but it's still a phone... Anyway, the pond was partially frozen. The fish seemed okay and there's an open chunk around the waterfall.

title: Canon Powershot G10
text: Stand.

title: Canon Powershot G10
text: The inside of a new watch. You can see the gears ticking.

title: Canon Powershot G10
text: The screen looked weird when trying to take these, so I didn't put much effort in. Turns out it's normal and the photos are fine.

text: A puddle in the garden.

title: Sony Handicam
text: I made a gif from my recording of the fireworks! Happy new year!
